#summary Lunar Lander User's Guide
#labels Guide

 The [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apollo_Guidance_Computer flight computer] is responsible for continuous data on the position and orientation of the spacecraft, and for [http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/constellation/altair/index.html descent engine] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apollo_PGNCS PGNCS] burns.
